{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":164561,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝――","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning――"},{"lineNumber":164562,"originalJapaneseLine":"うし車が街道を走っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A bullock cart was running along the highway."},{"lineNumber":164563,"originalJapaneseLine":"乗っているのは、紫の軍将軍、チャカとアスカ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Riding inside were the Purple Army’s general, Chaka, and Asuka,"},{"lineNumber":164564,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして副将のメルフェイスだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the deputy general, Melface."},{"lineNumber":164565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お……お〜……も、もうすこし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O... ooh... a little more...\""},{"lineNumber":164566,"originalJapaneseLine":"うし車の中でアスカとメルフェイスが","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the bullock cart, Asuka and Melface were"},{"lineNumber":164567,"originalJapaneseLine":"あやとりをしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"playing cat's cradle."},{"lineNumber":164568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「上手上手……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good, good..."},{"lineNumber":164569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう、その調子よ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, just like that...\""},{"lineNumber":164570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やったー、できたよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay! I did it."},{"lineNumber":164571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えへへへへ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehehehe.\""},{"lineNumber":164572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すごいわ、アスカ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amazing, Asuka."},{"lineNumber":164573,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうやり方覚えたなんてお利口ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're so smart to have already learned how.\""},{"lineNumber":164574,"originalJapaneseLine":"アスカの相手をしているメルフェイスは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Melface, who was playing with Asuka,"},{"lineNumber":164575,"originalJapaneseLine":"普段の副将軍ではなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"was not the usual deputy general,"},{"lineNumber":164576,"originalJapaneseLine":"柔らかな教師の顔をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but wore the gentle face of a teacher."},{"lineNumber":164577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……将軍……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... General...\""},{"lineNumber":164578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む？　どうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":164579,"originalJapaneseLine":"アスカが脱いだ状態で","translatedEnglishLine":"Asuka, who was in a removed state,"},{"lineNumber":164580,"originalJapaneseLine":"対面に座っていたチャカが応える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka, sitting opposite, answered."},{"lineNumber":164581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に良いのでしょうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it really alright?"},{"lineNumber":164582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は戦争中なのに、私達は別行動してしまって」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though we are in the middle of a war, we are acting separately.\""},{"lineNumber":164583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「安心せい、二、三日は両軍に動きはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do not worry, there will be no movement from either army for two or three days."},{"lineNumber":164584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それにバレスの了解も得ておる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, we have also obtained Bares's approval.\""},{"lineNumber":164585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":164586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……そろそろ、どこへ向かっているか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... may I soon ask where we are heading?"},{"lineNumber":164587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お聞きしても良いでしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it alright to ask?\""},

{"lineNumber":164588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".................\""},

{"lineNumber":164589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「離れ宮島は知っておるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you know the Detached Palace Island?\""},

{"lineNumber":164590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「宙に浮かんでおるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It floats in the sky,"},

{"lineNumber":164591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　月の始めの一日のみ、光の道が出来て","translatedEnglishLine":"and only on the first day of the month does a path of light appear,"},

{"lineNumber":164592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　渡れるようになる不思議な街」","translatedEnglishLine":"allowing one to cross—a mysterious town.\" "},

{"lineNumber":164593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes..."},

{"lineNumber":164594,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レベル神の聖地と呼ばれる場所、ですよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the place called the Holy Ground of the Level Gods, right?\""},

{"lineNumber":164595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、そこには色々なレベル神がおり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, various Level Gods dwell there,"},

{"lineNumber":164596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中には莫大な賄賂を差し出せば","translatedEnglishLine":"and some say if you offer them huge bribes,"},

{"lineNumber":164597,"originalJapaneseLine":"　才能限界値を上げてくれる神もおるとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"there are gods who will raise your talent ceiling...\""},{"lineNumber":164598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あの、それがどういう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Um, what do you mean by that?\""},{"lineNumber":164599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここから先が本題じゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From here on is the main point.\""},{"lineNumber":164600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その中にはレベルドレインによって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Among them are also gods who, through level drain,"},{"lineNumber":164601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レベルを下げる神もおるとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"can lower your level...\""},{"lineNumber":164602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メルフェイス、お前を救うにはそれしかない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Melface, that is the only way to save you."},{"lineNumber":164603,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今からお前はレベルを下げるんじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, you shall lower your level.\""},{"lineNumber":164604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...!\""},

{"lineNumber":164605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レベルを下げれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you lower your level,"},

{"lineNumber":164606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手は誰でもよくなる……","translatedEnglishLine":"your opponent will improve no matter who they are..."},

{"lineNumber":164607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それこそ好きな相手でもいればその人でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"even if it's someone you like, it can be that person...\" "},

{"lineNumber":164608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさか、では私達は今そのために……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way, are we doing this for that reason now...!\""},{"lineNumber":164609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いけません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, we must not!"},

{"lineNumber":164610,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は戦争中で……世界の危機なんです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We are in the middle of a war... the world is in crisis!\""},{"lineNumber":164611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は死んでも構わないと思っています！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't mind if I die!"},

{"lineNumber":164612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦えなくなるなんて……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Losing the ability to fight...!\""},{"lineNumber":164613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいや……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No..."},{"lineNumber":164614,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いかん」","translatedEnglishLine":"This cannot be."},{"lineNumber":164615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな……どうして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... why...\""},{"lineNumber":164616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「............」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...............\""},{"lineNumber":164617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これを儂の我が儘と言うなら構わん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you call this my selfishness, I don't mind.\""},{"lineNumber":164618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃがお前もまたアスカと同じ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you, like Asuka,"},{"lineNumber":164619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂にとって、孫のように思っておる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"are like a grandchild to me...\""},{"lineNumber":164620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「好きでもない男に抱かれ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Being embraced by a man you don't even love,"}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うし車が街道を走っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A bullock cart was running along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乗っているのは、紫の軍将軍、チャカとアスカ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Riding inside were the Purple Army’s general, Chaka, and Asuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして副将のメルフェイスだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the deputy general, Melface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お……お〜……も、もうすこし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O... ooh... a little more..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うし車の中でアスカとメルフェイスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the bullock cart, Asuka and Melface were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あやとりをしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: playing cat's cradle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「上手上手……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good, good...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、その調子よ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, just like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やったー、できたよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay! I did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへへへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごいわ、アスカ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing, Asuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうやり方覚えたなんてお利口ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're so smart to have already learned how."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスカの相手をしているメルフェイスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface, who was playing with Asuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段の副将軍ではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was not the usual deputy general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 柔らかな教師の顔をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but wore the gentle face of a teacher.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……将軍……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... General..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む？　どうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスカが脱いだ状態で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asuka, who was in a removed state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対面に座っていたチャカが応える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka, sitting opposite, answered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に良いのでしょうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it really alright?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は戦争中なのに、私達は別行動してしまって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though we are in the middle of a war, we are acting separately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「安心せい、二、三日は両軍に動きはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do not worry, there will be no movement from either army for two or three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにバレスの了解も得ておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, we have also obtained Bares's approval."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……そろそろ、どこへ向かっているか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... may I soon ask where we are heading?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お聞きしても良いでしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it alright to ask?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「離れ宮島は知っておるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know the Detached Palace Island?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宙に浮かんでおるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It floats in the sky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月の始めの一日のみ、光の道が出来て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and only on the first day of the month does a path of light appear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渡れるようになる不思議な街」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: allowing one to cross—a mysterious town."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、ええ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベル神の聖地と呼ばれる場所、ですよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the place called the Holy Ground of the Level Gods, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、そこには色々なレベル神がおり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, various Level Gods dwell there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には莫大な賄賂を差し出せば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some say if you offer them huge bribes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 才能限界値を上げてくれる神もおるとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are gods who will raise your talent ceiling..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あの、それがどういう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Um, what do you mean by that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここから先が本題じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From here on is the main point."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その中にはレベルドレインによって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Among them are also gods who, through level drain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルを下げる神もおるとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can lower your level..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メルフェイス、お前を救うにはそれしかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Melface, that is the only way to save you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今からお前はレベルを下げるんじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, you shall lower your level."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レベルを下げれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you lower your level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手は誰でもよくなる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your opponent will improve no matter who they are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそ好きな相手でもいればその人でも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if it's someone you like, it can be that person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、では私達は今そのために……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, are we doing this for that reason now...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いけません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we must not!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は戦争中で……世界の危機なんです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are in the middle of a war... the world is in crisis!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は死んでも構わないと思っています！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't mind if I die!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦えなくなるなんて……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Losing the ability to fight...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや……
いかん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This cannot be.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな……どうして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... why..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これを儂の我が儘と言うなら構わん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you call this my selfishness, I don't mind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃがお前もまたアスカと同じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you, like Asuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂にとって、孫のように思っておる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are like a grandchild to me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「好きでもない男に抱かれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being embraced by a man you don't even love,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うし車が街道を走っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A bullock cart was running along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乗っているのは、紫の軍将軍、チャカとアスカ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Riding inside were the Purple Army’s general, Chaka, and Asuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして副将のメルフェイスだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the deputy general, Melface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お……お〜……も、もうすこし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O... ooh... a little more..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うし車の中でアスカとメルフェイスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the bullock cart, Asuka and Melface were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あやとりをしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: playing cat's cradle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「上手上手……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good, good...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、その調子よ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, just like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やったー、できたよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay! I did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへへへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごいわ、アスカ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing, Asuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうやり方覚えたなんてお利口ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're so smart to have already learned how."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスカの相手をしているメルフェイスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface, who was playing with Asuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段の副将軍ではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was not the usual deputy general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 柔らかな教師の顔をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but wore the gentle face of a teacher.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……将軍……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... General..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む？　どうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスカが脱いだ状態で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asuka, who was in a removed state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対面に座っていたチャカが応える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka, sitting opposite, answered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に良いのでしょうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it really alright?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は戦争中なのに、私達は別行動してしまって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though we are in the middle of a war, we are acting separately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「安心せい、二、三日は両軍に動きはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do not worry, there will be no movement from either army for two or three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにバレスの了解も得ておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, we have also obtained Bares's approval."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……そろそろ、どこへ向かっているか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... may I soon ask where we are heading?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お聞きしても良いでしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it alright to ask?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「離れ宮島は知っておるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know the Detached Palace Island?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宙に浮かんでおるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It floats in the sky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月の始めの一日のみ、光の道が出来て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and only on the first day of the month does a path of light appear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渡れるようになる不思議な街」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: allowing one to cross—a mysterious town."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、ええ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベル神の聖地と呼ばれる場所、ですよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the place called the Holy Ground of the Level Gods, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、そこには色々なレベル神がおり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, various Level Gods dwell there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には莫大な賄賂を差し出せば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some say if you offer them huge bribes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 才能限界値を上げてくれる神もおるとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are gods who will raise your talent ceiling..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あの、それがどういう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Um, what do you mean by that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここから先が本題じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From here on is the main point."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その中にはレベルドレインによって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Among them are also gods who, through level drain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルを下げる神もおるとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can lower your level..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メルフェイス、お前を救うにはそれしかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Melface, that is the only way to save you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今からお前はレベルを下げるんじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, you shall lower your level."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レベルを下げれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you lower your level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手は誰でもよくなる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your opponent will improve no matter who they are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそ好きな相手でもいればその人でも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if it's someone you like, it can be that person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、では私達は今そのために……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, are we doing this for that reason now...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いけません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we must not!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は戦争中で……世界の危機なんです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are in the middle of a war... the world is in crisis!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は死んでも構わないと思っています！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't mind if I die!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦えなくなるなんて……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Losing the ability to fight...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや……
いかん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This cannot be.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな……どうして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... why..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これを儂の我が儘と言うなら構わん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you call this my selfishness, I don't mind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃがお前もまたアスカと同じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you, like Asuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂にとって、孫のように思っておる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are like a grandchild to me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「好きでもない男に抱かれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being embraced by a man you don't even love,
